content: Have you contacted Abusix? This is not something that Thunderbird is involved in. There is a contact page for Abusix at https://abusix.com/contact-abusix-support-sales/ I suggest starting there, or contacting your email provider.
creator: davidsk

content: If it works on some PCs, but not on other, my guess is that the setting in Windows for default email client needs to be set. Check the Default Apps module in Windows and verify there which program is the default email application.
creator: davidsk

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: 1. TB 128.9.2esr (64bit) - Versione portable 2. Win 10 pro 22H2 3. Tiscali 4. IMAP 5. Fornitore Filelink per Send v. 2.1.1 + ImportExportTools NG v. 14.1.8 6. Nessun errore 7. Sicurezza di Windows 8. Vedi allegato

content: I am unsure of your issue. From your post, it seems that your wife's email uses the same domain as yours. If so, you could create an additional account on your Thunderbird. My confusion is that you also state she is using plusnet. She has two accounts?

content: Please provide more information. Is this a Gmail account? If so, remember that all inboxes are subsets of Allmail (which often causes confusion).

content: If these are word documents, you need a word-compatible facility to read them. one option is https://www.office.com/ which has a free version of Micrsoft365, and there are many other such products.
